page.title: 11ANIMAL SHELTER. NEWPORT.
page.content: Near to our school, Hartridge Comprehensive, is the{Ringland Animal {Shelter.}This is run by the{R.S.P.C.A. and is the place in Newport where all stray or lost animals can be taken. The majority of animals there are dogs, but usually there are cats too. When a stray animal is found it is taken to the shelter and put into runs with other animals of the same type. It is fed and looked after for a week. During this time its owner can come and collect it after paying a fee. If the owner does not collect the animal then it is humanely destroyed. Other people go to the shelter to choose a new pet. Once again they have to pay a fee, but the animal is checked over to see that it is healthy before they take it away.
